column1: starts off with a gentle full-toss, which wobbles in the air, Gayle simply works it to the midwicket region
a tad overpitched on the pads, Watson duly flicks it away to the midwicket fence
back of a length on off, Watson pats the ball to cover
full and outside off, not a half-volley, Watson leans into the drive and sends the ball rolling past extra cover
Zaheer drags his length back on off, chopped out to point
hip-high short ball, Watson, though, can't control a pull. He mis-hits the ball to long leg
on a length, angled in on off stump, the swings away. Watson flashes at the ball and slices an outside edge to deep point, where Cummins runs around the ball, slides, fumbles, and gifts a boundary
short and angled in on middle, blocked to leg
hip-high short ball on the leg stump, Watson misses out on a scoring opportunity again, grazes the pad and sneaks away behind square
Gayle guides this one away to the boundary. No power, just finesse. Overpitched and outside off, Gayle waits for the ball, opens the face, and drives it between point and cover
dug in short and nipping away outside off, Gayle thinks about a hard-handed cut before bailing out of the shot at the last moment
back of a length and angling away outside off, Gayle aims to biff it down the ground. His feet went nowhere. Only connects with thin air
starts off with a 142ks short ball just outside off, hits the bat hard. Defended back to him
this is even quicker. Short and outside off, 144ks, Watson slashes it to the right of Samson at third man. The ball flew to the fielder
banged in short on middle, over the wicket to the left-hander too, Gayle hangs back and blocks to cover
really full and Cummins strays down the leg side, the ball evades Gayle's flick. Leg-side wide
short on off stump, hustles Gayle for pace, 147ks, Gayle drops the ball to cover and secures a single, though these two batsmen aren't the quickest between the wickets
Cummins runs in hard, hits the deck hard, hits the bat hard. Short of a length on off stump, Watson is beaten for pace as the ball wanders away to midwicket
fractionally short and outside off, Watson leans back and cuts it sweetly past point, beats deep third man running to his right
short rising ball on middle, opens the face and runs the ball to point

Gayle will have to wait further for 10,000 runs in T20 cricket. Morris gets Gayle for the third time in six innings. Only Ashwin has dismissed Gayle more times in IPL. This was a quick full-toss outside off, just below the waist, 145ks, surprises Gayle. He only splices the ball high in the air. Samson tracks the ball from mid-off. Moves back, then to his right, gets into a side-on position, and completes a sprawling catch. Excellent reflexes from Samson
full and outside off, presses forward and drives to mid-off
full on middle and leg, clipped away to midwicket
back of a length and angled in, pushed to midwicket on the back foot
low full-toss on the leg stump, you can't bowl there when you have fine leg inside the circle. Mandeep tickles it away very fine of that fielder. Sort of ruins the over
short on off, defended on the back foot
short and slides on outside off, chopped to point
skids down the leg side, wide
flatter and angled in to ping the front pad, then the back pad, beating the inside edge. But this was always heading down leg
Watson steps out, yorks himself, and ends up squeezing the ball down the ground
Nadeem gives this some air, but finds no turn. Defended
Mandeep backs away outside leg, aiming a mow over midwicket, Nadeem darts it outside leg and defeats the batsman. Mandeep lost his shape there and missed it
short and outside off, cut down to deep third man
short of a length and outside off, Mandeep rises on top of the bounce, and punches it crisply in the gap at cover. Quality shot
and again. Creamed to the left of mid-off and to the right of cover. Back of a length and outside off, Mandeep leans into it and banishes the ball to the boundary
slower offcutter, 122ks, Mandeep does not spot the change-up. He is early into a leg-side flick and is hit on the pad

chopped on. The middle stump is knocked back. One shot too many, Mandeep? He backs away outside leg and aims to flay it through cover. This is short of a length and outside off, Mandeep goes hard at the ball and drags it back onto the stumps
nearly bursts through Jadhav. Pace like fire - 154ks, according to the speedgun. Off-stump yorker, Jadhav jabs his bat down just in time
wide of the crease and darted in on off, Watson punches the ball hard to extra cover, where the fielder takes some pace off the ball
tossed up and angled in on middle and leg, hangs back and milks a single to midwicket
slides on with the arm on off, 96ks, Watson goes on the back foot and punches to extra cover
back of a length and angled in, finds some bounce. Watson misses a sweep and is hit high on the thigh pad
this is really full on the stumps, driven to long-on
arm-ball, comes in on middle, Jadhav stays back and works it away to the right of Nadeem
length ball outside off, non-turner, punched to cover
dropped short and outside off, Jadhav does not connect with a pull properly. Ends up dragging the ball to long-on
down the track and driven down the ground
tossed-up legbreak outside off, Jadhav uses his feet, but the line was very wide. He still reached out and lofted it superbly over cover
full and slower through the air, jabbed back at Mishra
hurries on outside off, flatter and quicker, Jadhav eyes up the leg side, slogs and does not connect
dragged down outside off, flat-batted down to long-off
leg-stump ball, shovelled away only as far as Zaheer at short fine leg
slides on outside off, punched to long-off
Watson steps out, Nadeem smartly shortens his length. Finds extra bounce and a bit of turn to defeat Watson's swish. Pant collects the ball outside off and does the rest
tossed up and drifts in on off, defended
shortish and fizzes on off, aims to cut from the stumps. Chops the ball to cover
floated outside off, half-volley, signs of rust from Zaheer. Drilled to long-off
Binny opens the face and glides it to the left of backward point. Carlos from the deep effects a direct hit and RCB take another one off the ricochet
short offcutter, bounces at the glove of the batsman. Awkwardly fended away
just short of a good length and angling away outside off, punched out to sweeper cover
back of a length and angling away outside off, Binny carves it away straight to point
stands up tall to meet this short ball outside off and serenely punches through cover
Nadeem finds grip and turn. The batsman shimmies out and defends uncertainly to cover
short and darted in on middle, cramps the batsman for room. Punched down the ground to long-on
another straight length ball, this is clipped away to deep midwicket

an appeal for stumping, the square leg umpire calls in the TV umpire. Has Jadhav grounded his back leg in time? Yep, he is safe. Just safe. Tossed up, turns away outside off. He eyes a slog-sweep against the turn and misses. Neat work from Pant. He has had a difficult couple of days
straight ball on middle, short, tucked square on the leg side
slides in with the arm, no hint of flight from Nadeem, flicks off the pads to deep square leg. Just five runs off the over. Nadeem finishes with 4-0-13-1, his most economical spell in the IPL
length and outside off, forward and driven through the line to mid-off
back of a length and angled in on off, shovelled away with the bottom hand to the leg side. Beats Karun running and sliding to his right from long-on
shorter and angled in on off, 145ks, opens the face and guides to point. They get a single via an overthrow
length ball outside off, now Jadhav stands and shovels the ball away to long-on
chest-high short ball on middle, 140ks, Binny is deep in the crease as he drops the ball to point and sets off
Jadhav shuffles across off, this is really full on leg or just outside off, Jadhav can't put bat on ball. The ball kisses the pad and sneaks away behind square
speared short on off, sits back and whips the ball away to wide long-on
flighted legbreak outside off, Jadhav goes down on one knee and slog-sweeps it fiercely down the ground. Sends the ball soaring into the stands
short of a length, turns away outside off, flat-batted away to the left of Mishra
tossed up on middle, Jadhav lines it up and dispatches it over Mishra's head
short and spins away outside off, carved away wide of sweeper for a couple

Jadhav sends another one soaring into the stands. Flighted legbreak outside off, Jadhav dares to hit against the turn. This is disdainfully slog-swept away over midwicket. 24 runs off the over, Mishra's third most expensive over in the IPL.
full and angling down the leg side, Binny looks to swat it over midwicket. No dice. Leg-side wide
full and outside off, Jadhav drives a long way away from hid body and watches an outside edge run down to third man
really full on the off stump, Jadhav goes deep in the crease and shovel-whips it away stylishly between deep midwicket and wide long-on. Classy hit
Jadhav ventures inside out. Oh my! What a shot. He steps back outside leg, Carlos follows him. Jadhav still manages to loft-drive it over extra cover. Skims over the boundary

short slower cutter outside off, scythed away to cover, where Billings makes a smart save but concedes overthrows. He reaches a 26-ball fifty. This is not his fastest fifty in the IPL, though. He has hit one off 24 balls before
Jadhav comes down the track, Carlos digs shorter on off and cramps him for room. Fended behind point
full-toss, angled in, driven down to long-on
slower offcutter outside off, the batsman swings early and misses
dipping yorker on the off stump, steps across off and clips it down the ground
Zaheer loses his line and length. Low full-toss outside off, past the guideline. Left alone
and Jadhav comes down the track, Zaheer notes it and sends down a slower bouncer. There comes on. Jadhav evades it
hip-high ball on the off stump, got to get it up higher, aimed a swat and skied it over square leg
overpitched and outside off, Jadhav flat-bats it powerfully cover. Stinging blow for the fielder. How hard did Jadhav hit that?
seam-up full ball on the leg stump. Binny whips it away but does not bother to keep the ball down. Billings takes a regulation catch at deep midwicket
length ball on off, opens the face and guides the ball to cover
Jadhav makes room outside leg, Brathwaite chases him, opens the face and angles it down to third man
Vinod uses his feet, Brathwaite bangs in a bouncer, aimed at the chest, top-edged over square leg
only the third short ball to Jadhav. This is a proper bouncer outside off, Brathwaite forces the batsman to duck under it
back of a length on the top of middle stump, Jadhav, having backed away outside leg, swats it away straight over the bowler's head
Brathwaite misses his length and is taken downtown. Full on off, right in the slot, launched into the top tier beyond long-off
good length offcutter outside off, opens the face and guides it to point
full on middle and leg, shimmies out, opens the face and drives it through extra cover
Vinod races down the track, takes a half-volley on middle, and puts it over long-on

Does not carry to Nadeem but he effects a run out at the bowler's end. Carved away to cover, falls just short of the fielder. Vinod chances a single. Nadeem spears a nice, flat throw to Zaheer, who breaks the stumps
slower, short ball, hits the ribs as Jadhav pulls early and takes the blow

Jadhav holes out to Morris at mid-off. This was full on off, slower from Zaheer, Jadhav lines up for a loft but loses his shape and only toe-ends the ball in the air. Morris, who is inside the circle, settles under this skier. Jadhav's blitz is over
length and angling away outside off, slashes and misses
just short of a good length and going away outside off, steered down to deep third man
wide yorker outside off, 142ks, Negi can't squirt it out
chest-high short ball, beats the batsman for pace
144ks yorker on middle and leg, an inside edge saves him. Edged onto the pad
short of a length, cramps Abdulla for room. Defended. Just two off the 18th over
tucked around the corner off the hips
the batsman backs away outside leg, Cummins chases him with a 144ks, short ball. Beats him
full on the leg stump, 140ks, clipped away to deep midwicket, where Nadeem and Karun collide. Nadeem slides and his shoulder rams into Karun's knee. No harm done
banged in short, aimed at the head, top-edged pull over square leg
Negi shimmies out, this is a bouncer aimed at his head. He looks away and top-edges a hook over square leg
wide yorker, Abdulla swishes and does not connect with it.  Just 16 off the last three overs with the wickets of Jadhav and Vinod
leg-stump yorker, 147ks, squeezed down to fine leg
Morris aims for the yorker, Negi steps out, takes it on the full-toss, and dumps it over the bowler's head
The middle stump is floored. The off and leg stumps are left spread-eagled. Rapid yorker, Negi can't carve it through the off side. Morris hits
Mills backs away outside the leg stump, this is hurled wide outside off. Mills can't reach out that far
not a perfect yorker, really full and outside off, 147ks, beats Mills' attempt to cover drive

Morris smashes the stumps again. Perfect finish to the innings for the Daredevils. Morris attempts the yorker, this ends up for a full-toss, but that's enough to clean up Mills. He can't put bat on the drive. 15 runs scored in the last three overs is RCB's third-lowest in the last three. Morris finishes with 17 dots in a four-over spell, only 3 bowlers have bowled more at Chinnaswamy
full and straight, lovely start. 140 kph. Some movement. Away movement. Played towards point. Out if he missed that
drifting down leg, 143 kph, wide. Bad ball. Lost his line
full delivery outside off, the ball moving away. Guided to point. Some outswing for Stanlake
nice lines, good single. Full and straight again, pushed to mid-off for a quick single. Early call, easy run
good length delivery around off, nice lines. Defended away towards mid-on.
poor delivery. Can't bowl there. Drifts on the pads, and Billings flicks him down to the fine leg boundary. Easily played
another poor delivery and that will be three more. Good work by Chahal. Full and too straight, flicked easily through midwicket for plenty of runs. Pulled in just inside
full and straight, driven back to the bowler. Nice pace
nice pace. Slow on off, some drift, no turn. Blocked back again
nice use of the feet. Billings runs down to the pitch and flicks the ball through midwicket for a run
full on leg, Tare gives himself some room and drives in the air towards cover. Bounces in front, skips off, misfielded towards long-off
nudged to square leg for a run
pushed to cover for one. Good over, tidy
really full and angled in, overpitched, Tare sits deep in the crease and whips it through midwicket
Stanlake goes wide of the crease but this back of a length ball holds its line outside off. Flashes and misses
short of a length and comes in at off, defended back to the bowler
pitched up and outside off, 146ks, Tare drives on the up to mid-off
Tare arches his back and looks to ramp this over third man but misses the short ball
overpitched and angled in on the leg stump, horrible delivery, picked up and whipped over square leg
flat and slides in with the arm, swatted away wide of midwicket

edged and flies between Gayle at first slip and Vinod, the keeper. Gayle does not even react. Smith and Rahane took these blinders in the recent Test series. Fired outside off, slashed and edged in the gap to the boundary
short of a length on middle and leg stays back, and punches the ball to deep midwicket
back of a length on middle, punched away between deep midwicket and long-on. Binny bolts to his left from deep wicket and pushes the ball back into the field of play
down the track, meets a short ball, and neatly clips it away to deep midwicket
short and homing in on the chest, 140ks, fended to midwicket
short and outside off, steps back and flat-bats it to cover
short on middle, bounces over the stumps, as Tare can't guide it down to third man

bowled'em. Tare is beaten for pace. Good length, 143ks, hustles Tare. Bursts through his defences and hits the off stump. Tare actually backed away, went hard at a cut, and missed. You can't cut this line and length and that Tare stepped away made things difficult for him
short on off, opens the face and runs it to point
back of a length and wide outside off, Nair reaches out, drives away from the body, and edges it to third man
back of a length and outside off, punched to mid-off
back of a length and angled in, clipped away to wide long-on

Stanlake nails middle and off. This is a fine ball, 144ks, back of a length and angled in and nips away slightly, Nair has a short front foot stride. He can't cover the line. Plays down the wrong line. The off stump takes a beating. Maiden IPL wicket for Stanlake

wide of the crease, angled in on off, whipped away square through the leg side. Chahal chases and pushes the ball into the field of play or not. Chahal was tantalisingly close to the boundary. Looks like he is in contact with it while aiming to push the ball back. The TV umpire is happy with Chahal's effort. Just three
full, fast on off, chipped past the outstretched right hand of the bowler
back of a length and outside off, throws the bat at the ball and inside-edges it behind square
length and outside off, punched through the off side
what a ripper from Chahal. Pitches on middle stump and fizzes away outside off past the outside edge. Too good to even nick it
full on the stumps, nudged to leg
Reverse swept over point for a six! Billings pre-meditates, brings his fast hands into play, and sends the ball sailing over point. Stunning execution, he picked it from middle and leg
Billings steps out, Chahal goes short and is pushed down the ground for one
uses his feet and nurdles this incoming ball to short fine leg
back of a length and angled into the hips, clipped through square leg
Stanlake runs to his left from backward point and grabs this sliced outside edge. Tossed up wide and turns away outside off, slashes away from the body and holes out
back of a length on off, stands tall and forces the ball to long-off
first-ball six! Whoa. Flighted on middle and leg, hares down the track and smashes the ball over midwicket
flatter and wider outside off, past the guideline, left alone
another off-side wide
shortish and outside off, chopped away to point. Pant and Samson chance a single. Samson puts in a full-length dive at the striker's end, a direct hit might have got him
quick and skids on outside off, left alone
dragged away to wide long-on
much quicker through the air, fizzes in to hit the pad, beating the inside edge
dropped short and wide outside off, chopped to point, where Watson dives and fumbles
fired outside off, Pant shows Chahal respect and lets it pass
darted short and outside off, cut to sweeper cover
length ball angled in, pushed down to mid-on for now
short and outside off, 143ks, Samson is late to chop it away. He drags an inside edge past the leg stump. Mills collapses in his followthrough
short and flies through outside off to Vinod, Pant arches his back and evades it
short on middle, not short enough, helped away behind square on the leg side
full on off, whipped with the wrists to deep midwicket
slower short ball outside off, Pant waits for the ball to arrive, then scythes it to sweeper cover
back of a length on off, played back to the bowler
hip-high short ball on middle, firmly pulled away to deep midwicket
yikes, Mills lets the ball through his fingers. He is embarrassed. Back of a length and outside off, flashed down to third man, where Mills makes a mess of it
full on off, clipped to midwicket
Samson has been bounced out. Chest-high short ball on off, rushes Samson into a pull. He is on the front foot and only top-edges a catch to Binny at long-on
wide of the crease, full angled into the pads, clipped away to deep square leg
full and picked off the pads to long-on
back of a length and stops on off stump, nearly chipped back to Watson
bouncer outside off,  head-high ball, Pant takes it on and swats it away over deep square leg off the top edge. Binny runs to his left, leaps, and watches the ball sail over him
pushed back to the bowler
a bit too full and outside off, carves a drive to sweeper cover
pretty full and straight, picked off through midwicket
full ball on off, Morris plays back and works the ball to square leg
Abdulla errs short and outside off, Pant unleashes a rasping back-foot cut between point and cover
tossed up outside off, Pant lines it up and slog-sweeps it powerfully over midwicket. Boom
speared wide outside off, left alone
breaking down the leg side, some bounce as well, wide
short and outside off, forced through the covers

arm ball from Abdulla, pins Morris in front. This was a full ball sliding into the right-hander. Instead of pressing forward, Morris plays back, is beaten on the inside edge and hit on the back pad in front of middle. Plumb
full on the pads, whipped away to deep square leg for a double
short ball on off, Pant is hurried into a pull, miscued to deep midwicket
Watson sends down a bouncer, Brathwaite ducks under it
full on off, defended back to Watson
hip-high short ball, pulled away to deep square leg
tucked off the pads to square-ish long leg
slightly short and outside off, cut to Watson at cover
flat and really wide outside off, Pant opts to shoulder arms
this is ferociously belted back to Chahal. The bowler is hit on the left shin. Tossed-up legbreak outside off, Chahal is in some pain

big appeal for lbw, this looks adjacent. Plumb. Umpire Virender Sharma, though, does not give it.  Pushed through flatter and quicker, the length is full, and Carlos plays back and is pinned in front of off and middle. Lucky break for Brathwaite. Chahal is peeved

Brathwaite's luck immediately runs out. Tossed up straight, Brathwaite eyes a big slog-sweep. Looks like his bat got stuck into the pitch as he was attempting the big mow. Bowled. The middle stump is rattled. Chahal lets out an almighty roar
slower through the air and drifts in, Cummins plays all around it and is hit on the pad, but not given. Replays show this was inside-edged onto the pad. Umpire Sharma got it right this time
shot. Full and angling into the pads, crunched away to the midwicket boundary. Whipped with great authority
slower short ball outside off, swatted over midwicket
full on off, jabbed to point
back of a length and outside off, opens the face and guides it square through the off side
back of a length and angled in on middle, pushed to point
back of a length on off stump, swiped away to mid-on
short fine leg is inside the circle and Watson errs full and down leg. Picked up and helped fine of that fielder
Dragged onto the leg stump. Back of a length and slanted in, Cummins looks to drive down the ground and plays it back onto the stumps
back of a length on off, Mishra dabs straight to cover. Pant looks for a quick single and is sent back
back of a length and outside off, flashed straight to Gayle at point
back of a length on middle, opens the face and guides it to deep point
full and outside off, Pant swishes and misses. What a comeback from Watson. Just one run after the first-ball four
short of a length and outside off, Mishra arches his back and upper-cuts it in the air to the right of deep third man
short ball homing in on the chest, fended into the middle of the pitch. They chance a single. Mills and Pant collide but the latter completes a single
back-of-the-hand slower ball outside off, Pant slogs and toe-ends the ball towards long-on. Brings up a fine fifty

107ks slower ball from the back of the hand, Mishra almost caught the ball with the glove. He looks away, takes his eyes off the ball, looks to evade it, but the ball does not even arrive. When it does, Mishra waves his glove at the ball. Bizarre
back of a length on middle, clipped away to deep square leg
Pant shuffles across off stump, this is the slower short ball, Pant gets inside it and top-edges a pull over long leg
bounces over the stumps. Watson has his hands on his head. Back of a length, swishes and misses
Mishra gestures he had hit this with the bat. But no inside edge involved. Given as runs. Back of a length and angled in to hit the pad. The tracker shows it would hit middle. Not given
full and outside off, smacked down to long-on. Binny makes a superb diving save under pressure
good length. Shortish and outside off, Mishra cuts and misses
back of a length and outside off, Mishra swings wildly, he still can't connect
what is Mishra trying to do. He shuffles across off and does not connect with a scoop. Watson has conceded just seven from his last two overs

first-ball wicket. Negi hits the leg stump and the Chinnaswamy raises itself to a huuuuge roar. This is a seam-up fast ball, Pant shuffles across off and goes low for the sweep. Does not get bat onto it. Negi floors the leg stump with this quick fizzer, striking with his first ball of the season against his former team. Credit to Pant too for showing steel and resolve after a personal tragedy

an appeal for a stumping, the TV umpire has been called in. He grounds his back leg. Vinod swipes the bails off but Nadeem is safe. Back of a length and outside off, Nadeem swings and does not connect
This is a skier and Negi bolts back and takes it himself. Tossed up on middle, Nadeem looks to loft it away but only skews it in the air. Nagi runs back and settles under it near the mid-on region
short of a length on middle, slugged away to deep midwicket
99ks length ball, swung away to wide long-on
Mishra steps out, this is short on middle, hit to long-on
